name: device-object-reference
description: Represents a reference to a specific BACnet object, optionally including the device identifier for network-wide uniqueness.

fields.name: device-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the BACnet device containing the object. Should be omitted if the object is local.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the BACnet object being referenced.
